snippet: Schalke 04 attacking midfielder Leroy Sane wants to leave the Bundesliga club, sporting director Christian Heidel Winger has confirmed....

headline.main: Sane Has Asked to Leave Schalke, Says Club Director
headline.print_headline: Sane Has Asked to Leave Schalke, Says Club Director

lead_paragraph: Schalke 04 attacking midfielder Leroy Sane wants to leave the Bundesliga club, sporting director Christian Heidel Winger has confirmed.

snippet: Danish international Viktor Fisher has joined promoted Middlesbrough on a three-year contract from Ajax Amsterdam, the clubs said on Friday.    The 21-year-old winger, who has won eight caps, was under contact to the Dutch league runners-up until ...
lead_paragraph: Danish international Viktor Fisher has joined promoted Middlesbrough on a three-year contract from Ajax Amsterdam, the clubs said on Friday.    The 21-year-old winger, who has won eight caps, was under contact to the Dutch league runners-up until the end of next season but has moved to the English Premier League for an undisclosed fee.

snippet: Stoke City have won their appeal against the red card shown to defender Geoff Cameron during the 2-1 Premier League defeat by West Bromwich Albion on Saturday, the FA said on its website on Monday....

headline.main: Stoke Win Cameron Red Card Appeal
headline.print_headline: Stoke Win Cameron Red Card Appeal

lead_paragraph: Stoke City have won their appeal against the red card shown to defender Geoff Cameron during the 2-1 Premier League defeat by West Bromwich Albion on Saturday, the FA said on its website on Monday.

snippet: Midfielder Ruben Loftus-Cheek has signed a new contract with Chelsea that will keep him at the club until 2021, the Premier League club said....

headline.main: Cheek Commits Long-Term Future to Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Cheek Commits Long-Term Future to Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Ruben Loftus-Cheek has signed a new contract with Chelsea that will keep him at the club until 2021, the Premier League club said.

snippet: Burnley have punished 12 supporters following a minor pitch invasion in a match against Preston North End last season, the Premier League side said in a statement on Tuesday....

headline.main: Burnley Punish 12 Fans After Pitch Invasion
headline.print_headline: Burnley Punish 12 Fans After Pitch Invasion

lead_paragraph: Burnley have punished 12 supporters following a minor pitch invasion in a match against Preston North End last season, the Premier League side said in a statement on Tuesday.

snippet: Zenit St. Petersburg have signed central defender Vukasin Jovanovic from Red Star Belgrade, the Russian champions' website (www.fc-zenit.ru) said on Saturday....

headline.main: Zenit Sign Red Star Defender Jovanovic
headline.print_headline: Zenit Sign Red Star Defender Jovanovic

lead_paragraph: Zenit St. Petersburg have signed central defender Vukasin Jovanovic from Red Star Belgrade, the Russian champions' website (www.fc-zenit.ru) said on Saturday.

snippet: Manchester United's injury-prone defender Phil Jones could be sidelined for around a month due to a knee problem, the Premier League club said in a statement....

headline.main: United's Jones Faces Spell on Sidelines After Knee Injury
headline.print_headline: United's Jones Faces Spell on Sidelines After Knee Injury

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's injury-prone defender Phil Jones could be sidelined for around a month due to a knee problem, the Premier League club said in a statement.

snippet: Alberto Paloschi will make a swift return to his homeland after Premier League side Swansea City confirmed on Friday that the striker has agreed to join Italian club Atalanta for an undisclosed fee....

headline.main: Paloschi to Join Atalanta From Swansea City
headline.print_headline: Paloschi to Join Atalanta From Swansea City

lead_paragraph: Alberto Paloschi will make a swift return to his homeland after Premier League side Swansea City confirmed on Friday that the striker has agreed to join Italian club Atalanta for an undisclosed fee.

snippet: Aston Villa have been sold to Recon Group, owned by Chinese businessman Xia Jiantong, the English Championship (second tier) club announced on Tuesday....

headline.main: Aston Villa Confirm Sale of Club to Chinese Magnate
headline.print_headline: Aston Villa Confirm Sale of Club to Chinese Magnate

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa have been sold to Recon Group, owned by Chinese businessman Xia Jiantong, the English Championship (second tier) club announced on Tuesday.

snippet: Watford midfielder Ben Watson has signed a one-year contract extension that will keep him at Vicarage Road until 2018, the Premier League club said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Watford midfielder Ben Watson has signed a one-year contract extension that will keep him at Vicarage Road until 2018, the Premier League club said on Monday.
